definition: to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Radioactive iodine has a half-life of eight days and decays naturally within weeks.
sentences.chinese: 放射性碘的半衰期爲八天，幾周內自然衰變。

sentences.english: The water temperature originates in geothermy warming rate and the radioactive element decay has the heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 水溫來源於地熱增溫率及放射元素的衰變產生熱能。

sentences.english: An excellent antioxidant, may slow oil decay rate, extended oil change period.
sentences.chinese: 優良的抗氧性，可減緩油品衰變速度，延長換油期。

sentences.english: Over time, that carbon-14 will decay to regular carbon-12.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間推移，碳14將衰變爲常規的碳12。

sentences.english: The problem of atomic decay in the microcavity is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了微腔中原子衰變問題。

sentences.english: Since these elements are unstable, they radioactively decay.
sentences.chinese: 由於這些元素不穩定，它們會發生放射性衰變。

sentences.english: No connection between simplicity and decay appears .
sentences.chinese: 基本性與衰變之間沒有聯繫。

sentences.english: Most of the Ice Age spans a period of time for which no element has an appropriate decay rate.
sentences.chinese: 冰川期的大部分期間都找不到具有合適衰變率的元素。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the pions quickly decay into mu mesons , or muons , which penetrate to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 同時，介子會快速衰變成緲子抵達地面。

sentences.english: Decay chains of some parent nu-clides are discussed as well.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還對某些核素的衰變鏈作了適當討論。

sentences.english: The decay pathways in successive decay chain were coded with binary digits.
sentences.chinese: 用二進制數對遞次衰變鏈的衰變路徑進行編碼。

sentences.english: The decay pathways in successive decay chain were coded with binary digits.
sentences.chinese: 用二進制數對遞次衰變鏈的衰變路徑進行編碼。

sentences.english: The parent uranium has been partitioned from its decay products.
sentences.chinese: 鈾母體與其衰變產物分離。

sentences.english: In a three-body decay, the emerging particles have more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在三體衰變中，出現的產物粒子有較大的自由度。

sentences.english: The nucleus decays into three particles which go off in separate directions.
sentences.chinese: 這個核衰變成飛向不同方向的三個粒子。

definition: Vertical Alliance, clique of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
